name: Revolotto
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Revolotto is a decentralized cryptocurrency that grants investors holding (RVL) instant rewards on all transactions, and protects them with its unique coin circulation cycles and burn protocol.
